page.title: 17REYMERSTON VILLAGE HALL
page.content: {We interviewed Mr.Adcock who is the {chairman of Reymerston village hall. Q:Where are meetings held ? A:Reymerston village hall. Q:Who keeps the keys ?. A:Mrs.Wheeler and Mrs.Peel keep some as well as myself. Q:When was it built? A:1954. {We interviewed Mrs Vera Chapman who is {the treasurer of Reymerston Village {Hall. Q:How long have you lived in the village? A:I have lived here 40 years. Q:Do you like the village? A:Yes very much. Q:How old is the farm you live on? A:Our farm is 400 years old. Q:What are your hobbies? A:Collecting postcards and keeping a scrapbook about Reymerston.
